title: Design Process for Elementary Mathematics Learning Using Blended Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Customized education for pre-service teachers to strengthen mathematics curriculum design competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more elementary mathematics lesson designs by applying blended teaching methodologies.
Learners can provide five specific feedbacks on peers' learning designs using a peer assessment system.
Learners can create two types of mathematics activity materials utilizing digital tools (e.g., GeoGebra, LMS quizzes).

resources: LMS Platform (Course Materials, Discussion Board, Assignment Submission System)
Learning Design Templates and Assessment Rubrics

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
